Question: Helio Water CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Amazfit Helio Ring

- Introduced at CES 2024
- Sleek and lightweight design with a titanium alloy construction
- 10ATM water resistance for swimming and water sports
- Comprehensive performance tracking including sleep monitoring and athletic recovery stats
- Supports four workout modes and provides predictive analytics for running
- Integrated with Zepp Aura AI companion app for personalized health insights
- Offers up to 7 days of battery life
- Electrodermal Activity (EDA) sensors for monitoring emotional stress indicators
- Integration with Amazfit smartwatches and Zepp App for integrated data tracking
Summary_cn:
Amazfit Helio 环

- 在2024年CES上推出
- 精致轻巧的设计，采用钛合金结构
- 10ATM防水功能，适用于游泳和水上运动
- 全面的性能跟踪，包括睡眠监测和运动恢复统计
- 支持四种运动模式，并提供跑步预测分析
- 集成了Zepp Aura AI伴侣应用程序，提供个性化的健康洞察
- 提供长达7天的电池续航时间
- 电皮肤活动（EDA）传感器，用于监测情绪压力指标
- 可与Amazfit智能手表和Zepp应用程序集成，实现数据跟踪整合
